author: Digital Foundry
description:
Thanks to MSI for sponsoring this content. Learn more about MSI's Black Friday discounts here: https://msi.gm/S2E1BB30

One of PC gaming's most infamously poor ports, it has been left to the modding community - and increasingly more powerful hardware over the years - to get the game into an acceptable state, to the point where RTX Remix support is now in a position to transform the game into a path-tracing showcase. Alex demonstrates just how poor the original version was on period-appropriate hardware and charts the game's "evolution" over the years, up to the work-in-progress RTX Remix mod from xoxor4d. Path tracing support is in its infancy, but it's already looking fantastic. 

Support Modder xoxor4d: https://www.patreon.com/xoxor4d
GTA 4 Path Tracing will be made publicly available here (when ready): https://github.com/xoxor4d

00:00:00 Introduction
00:01:26 GTA 4's Poor PC Legacy
00:07:37 Path Tracing in GTA 4
00:14:36 Conclusion
title: Grand Theft Auto 4 PC - From Disaster Port To Path Traced Modding Showcase
